products.name: Remington Keratin Protect Straightener
products.description: Shiny, healthy-looking hair is on-trend, but the combination of high heat and dry hair, which often occurs when you straighten your hair, can cause splitting, damage, weaken your hair. Luckily, Remington have come up with a solution to help end excessive heat and lack of protection.

products.name: Manhattan T2-R 500Gb Freeview High Definition Recorder
products.description: Receives over 60 channels with up to 15 in HD and 25 radio stations ause, record and rewind live TV 8-day programme guide

products.name: Juice 3 Powerbank Red
products.description: Input 1: Micro USB DC5V/2A. Input 2: Type C DC5V/2A. Output 1: USB A DC 5V/2. 1A (max). Output 2: Type C DC 5V/2. 4A (max). Total Output: DC 5V/2. 4A (max). CE certified Portable charger for mobile charges an average smartphone from 0-50% in only fifty minutes and 3 charges of an average smartphone. 2. 4 Amp max output to charge mobiles. 10000mAh/37Wh portable power bank. Charge 2 devices at once USB-A and USB Type-C ports. Digital display to check remaining energy levels.

products.name: Case it iPhone 7/8 Black Folio Screen Protector
products.description: Made from a strong, hard-wearing material, the case provides excellent protection for your phone and the soft suede-effect inner lining keeps your device scratch-free. The included screen protector will make sure your device is protected all round.
